origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialDataAPI.get_market_risk_data', 'description': 'Get market risk data for a specific bank over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which data is required, e.g., 'last_year'.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'risk_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing market risk data for the specified bank and period.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.analyze_risk_factors', 'description': 'Analyze key market risk factors using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'risk_data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The market risk data to be analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis results of key market risk factors.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.predict_future_risk', 'description': 'Predict future market risk trends based on historical data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'historical_data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'Historical market risk data to be used for prediction.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prediction_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the predicted market risk trends for the next year.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.provide_risk_management_advice', 'description': 'Provide market risk management advice based on AI analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis results of key market risk factors.'}, {'name': 'prediction_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The predicted market risk trends for the next year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'A list of recommendations for market risk management.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取Bank of America过去一年的市场风险数据。接下来，使用人工智能算法分析市场风险的关键因素。然后，预测未来一年的市场风险趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的市场风险管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去一年的市场风险数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
